text.div:
Narratif généré : SearchParameter ror-sp-residential-type

RORSPResidentialType

Paramètre residential-type:token

Paramètre de recherche pour récupérer le type d'habitation

RessourceLocation
ExpressionLocation.extension.where(url='https://interop.esante.gouv.fr/ig/fhir/ror/StructureDefinition/ror-location-residential-capacity').extension.where(url='residentialType').value.as(CodeableConcept)
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: RORSPResidentialType
description: Paramètre de recherche pour récupérer le type d'habitation
